dict.acceptation: 脸颊，脸蛋；无礼而放肆的行为，厚颜；半边屁股；两侧相对的物体；

sent.orig: The two lovers danced cheek to cheek.
sent.trans: 那对情侣脸贴着脸跳舞。

sent.orig: He gave the boy pinch on the cheek for joke.
sent.trans: 他开玩笑地在男孩的脸颊上拧了一把。

sent.orig: Anton, aged 21, kissed her gently on the cheek and they strolled off arm in arm.
sent.trans: 21岁的安顿轻吻了一下卡丽娜的脸颊，两人手挽着手在大街上漫步。

sent.orig: And as always, he brushed her cheek with a gentle kiss.
sent.trans: 并且一如既往，爸爸在她的面颊，轻轻一吻。
